name: squad_49-gaming-laptop-search
description: --- ### IDEA OF THIS PROJECT :- The idea of this ASAP project is to create an application for the user to search for **Gaming Laptops** which are available in the market. There are certain criterias like range of prices , type of specifications and etc and etc. ### FEATURES OF THIS PROJECT :- The features of this project are as follows :- * Search Bar * Price Range * Sort prices from low to high and high to low. * Sort laptops on the basis on type of processors.  * Sort laptops on the basis on type of internal graphic card. * Sort laptops on the basis on type of Ram. * Sort laptops on the basis on type of storage capacities.
